verses.text: \w In|strong="H1732"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, do I take refuge; Let me never \w be|strong="H1732"\w* put \w to|strong="H1732"\w* shame: Deliver me \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* righteousness.

Bow down thine ear \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w*; \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* speedily: \w Be|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strong rock, \w A|strong="H3068"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* defence \w to|strong="H3068"\w* save \w me|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w For|strong="H1004"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w art|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w fortress|strong="H4581"\w*; \w Therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H3467"\w* nameâ€™s sake lead \w me|strong="H5337"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* guide \w me|strong="H5337"\w*.

Pluck \w me|strong="H5148"\w* out \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w net|strong="H4686"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* laid privily \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5148"\w*; \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* art \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4686"\w*.

\w Into|strong="H3318"\w* \w thy|strong="H3318"\w* hand \w I|strong="H3588"\w* commend \w my|strong="H3318"\w* spirit: \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast redeemed \w me|strong="H3318"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* God \w of|strong="H3318"\w* truth.

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* hate \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* regard lying vanities; \w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* trust \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* lovingkindness; \w For|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast seen \w my|strong="H8104"\w* affliction: Thou hast known \w my|strong="H8104"\w* soul \w in|strong="H3068"\w* adversities;

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w hast|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* shut \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w into|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* hand \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* enemy; \w Thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w hast|strong="H3045"\w* set \w my|strong="H7200"\w* feet \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* large place.

\w Have|strong="H3027"\w* mercy \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5975"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w in|strong="H5975"\w* \w distress|strong="H3027"\w*: \w Mine|strong="H3027"\w* eye wasteth away \w with|strong="H3027"\w* grief, \add yea\add*, \w my|strong="H3027"\w* soul \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3027"\w* body.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* spent \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3708"\w*, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* years \w with|strong="H3068"\w* sighing: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5315"\w* faileth \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* mine iniquity, \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w wasted|strong="H6244"\w* \w away|strong="H6244"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3615"\w* \w mine|strong="H3615"\w* adversaries \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am become \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reproach, \w Yea|strong="H3588"\w*, unto \w my|strong="H3615"\w* neighbors exceedingly, \w And|strong="H8141"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fear \w to|strong="H8141"\w* \w mine|strong="H3615"\w* acquaintance: \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H8141"\w* see \w me|strong="H3588"\w* \w without|strong="H8141"\w* fled \w from|strong="H2416"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* forgotten \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dead \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w mind|strong="H3045"\w*: \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken vessel.

\w For|strong="H4191"\w* \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* heard \w the|strong="H1961"\w* defaming \w of|strong="H3627"\w* many, Terror \w on|strong="H1961"\w* every side: \w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3820"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* counsel together against \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w They|strong="H3820"\w* devised \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* away \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H3947"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w*, \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* art \w my|strong="H8085"\w* God.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* times \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* hand: Deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* hand \w of|strong="H3068"\w* mine enemies, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* persecute \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* face \w to|strong="H6256"\w* shine \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* servant: \w Save|strong="H5337"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* lovingkindness.

Let \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* put \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shame, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* called \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*: Let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked \w be|strong="H5650"\w* put \w to|strong="H5921"\w* shame, let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* silent \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Sheol.

Let \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lying lips \w be|strong="H3068"\w* dumb, \w Which|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous insolently, \w With|strong="H3068"\w* pride \w and|strong="H3068"\w* contempt.

Oh how great \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* goodness, Which \w thou|strong="H1696"\w* hast laid \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H6662"\w* fear \w thee|strong="H1696"\w*, Which \w thou|strong="H1696"\w* hast wrought \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H6662"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H6662"\w*!

\w In|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* covert \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="H4100"\w* \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* plottings \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*: \w Thou|strong="H4100"\w* wilt \w keep|strong="H6845"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w secretly|strong="H6845"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pavilion \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3373"\w* strife \w of|strong="H1121"\w* tongues.

Blessed \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*; \w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w hath|strong="H3956"\w* showed \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* marvellous lovingkindness \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strong city.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H1288"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* haste, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H2617"\w* off \w from|strong="H3068"\w* before \w thine|strong="H1288"\w* eyes: \w Nevertheless|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* heardest \w the|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* supplications, \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cried|strong="H5892"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H1288"\w*.

Oh love \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, all \w ye|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* saints: \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* preserveth \w the|strong="H8085"\w* faithful, \w And|strong="H6963"\w* plentifully rewardeth \w him|strong="H6963"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* dealeth proudly.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* strong, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w take|strong="H6213"\w* courage, \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.
